name: Titanium.UI.ListItem
summary: A list item is an individual item in a list section.

properties.name: accessoryType
properties.summary: Sets an accessory on the right side of an item.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.summary: Background color of the view, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: backgroundGradient
properties.summary: Background gradient to render when the item is not selected.

properties.name: backgroundImage
properties.summary: Background image to render when the item is not selected.
properties.description: Must be a local resource.

properties.name: backgroundSelectedColor
properties.summary: Background color of the view, as a color name or hex triplet when item is selected.
properties.description: On Android, clicking on ListItem's sub-views will not trigger this unless these views have 'touchEnabled' set to false. For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: backgroundSelectedGradient
properties.summary: Background gradient to render when the item is selected.

properties.name: backgroundSelectedImage
properties.summary: Background image to render when the item is selected.
properties.description: Must be a local resource. On Android, clicking on ListItem's sub-views will not trigger this unless these views have 'touchEnabled' set to false.

properties.name: canEdit
properties.summary: Specifies if the item can be deleted by a user initiated action.
properties.description: For more information see the "Editing Support" section of Titanium.UI.ListView.

properties.name: canInsert
properties.summary: Specifies if the item can be inserted by a user initiated action.
properties.description: For more information see the "Editing Support" section of Titanium.UI.ListView.

properties.name: canMove
properties.summary: Specifies if the item can be reordered within the list view by a user initiated action.
properties.description: For more information see the "Editing Support" section of Titanium.UI.ListView.

properties.name: color
properties.summary: Default text color of the item when not selected, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description:
For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

On Android, selectedColor is not supported, so the text is always displayed in this color.

Only applies to the built-in templates.

properties.name: editActions
properties.summary: Specifies custom action items to be shown when when a list item is edited.
properties.description: For more information see the "Editing Support" section of Titanium.UI.ListView.

properties.name: font
properties.summary: Font to use for the item title.
properties.description: Only applies to the built-in templates.

properties.name: height
properties.summary: Row height in platform-specific units.
properties.description:
On Android, the value can be either a float value or a dimension string, for example, '40dp'. By default, the minimum height is 30 dp on the Android platform.

On iOS, the value can only be an absolute value.

properties.name: image
properties.summary: Image to render in the image area of the item, specified as a local path or URL.
properties.description:
On iOS, the image is on the left, and on Android, the image is on the right.

On Android, this image only appears on the default template.

On iOS, only local images are supported.

On iOS, this image only appears if the ListDataItem template property or ListView defaultItemTemplate property is either: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_DEFAULT, LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE.

properties.name: itemId
properties.summary: A user defined string that gets passed to events.

properties.name: searchableText
properties.summary: The text to match against when the Titanium.UI.ListView is performing a search.
properties.description: Used in conjunction with searchView, searchText and caseInsensitiveSearch properties of ListView.

properties.name: selectedBackgroundColor

deprecated.notes: This property has been deprecated in favor of backgroundSelectedColor.

properties.summary: Background color of the view, as a color name or hex triplet when item is selected.
properties.description: On Android, clicking on ListItem's sub-views will not trigger this unless these views have 'touchEnabled' set to false. For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: selectedBackgroundGradient

deprecated.notes: This property has been deprecated in favor of backgroundSelectedGradient.

properties.summary: Background gradient to render when the item is selected.

properties.name: selectedBackgroundImage

deprecated.notes: This property has been deprecated in favor of backgroundSelectedImage.

properties.summary: Background image to render when the item is selected.
properties.description: Must be a local resource. On Android, clicking on ListItem's sub-views will not trigger this unless these views have 'touchEnabled' set to false.

properties.name: selectedColor
properties.summary: Color to use for the item title when the item is selected, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description:
This property is only used on iOS.

For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: selectedSubtitleColor
properties.summary: Color to use for the item subtitle when the item is selected, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description:
This property is only used on iOS and if the ListDataItem template property or ListView defaultItemTemplate property is either: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE, LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_CONTACTS or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS.

For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: selectionStyle
properties.summary: Selection style constant to control the selection color.
properties.description: Specify one of the constants from <Titanium.UI.SELECTION_STYLE_*>.

properties.name: subtitle
properties.summary: Subtitle to set in the text area of the item.
properties.description: This subtitle only appears if the ListDataItem template property or ListView defaultItemTemplate property is set to either: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_CONTACTS, LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE.

properties.name: subtitleColor
properties.summary: Default text color of the subtitle, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: This property is only used on iOS and if the ListDataItem template property or ListView defaultItemTemplate property is either: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE, LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_CONTACTS or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS.

properties.name: title
properties.summary: Title to set in the text area of the item.
properties.description: This title only appears for the built-in templates.
